Detailed Description

Base class for nearly all DAZ SDK objects.

Derived from QObject, allowing for use of the signals-slots architecture of Qt. This class defines a number of functions used for file saving/loading which can be overridden in children classes that need to save and load data in the native file format.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzBase::DzBase ( QObject *  parent = 0,
const QString &  name = QString::null 
)

Constructor. Creates a new DzBase object with the given parent and name.

Parameters:
parent If this is not 0, the new DzBase-derived class will be added as a child of the given QObject-derived class. See the Qt documentation for more on the description of the QObject parent-child relationship.
name If not NULL, this becomes the QObject name for the object. This name is the one used for accessing the instance of the object in DAZ Script (via QObject parent-child ownership) and as such should not contain spaces or other special characters that can not be used for variable naming. See the Qt and QtScript documentation for more information.

Member Function Documentation

DzError DzBase::finishLoad ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework after all data for the object has been loaded from file. Derived classes can override this method to finish loading operations or clean up temporary items that were used during loading.

Parameters:
file The file that was read.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.

Returns:
A pointer to the static class factory for the object.

Provided for DAZ Script backwards compatibility only. Script developers should use the property name instead, which is available for all QObjects, not just DAZ Studio objects.
Returns:
The name of the object.
bool DzBase::iskindof ( const QString &  clname  )  [slot]
Deprecated:
Provided for DAZ Script backwards compatibility only. Script developers should use the function QOBject::inherits() instead, which is available for all QObjects, not just DAZ Studio objects.

Returns:
true if the object is of the given type, otherwise false.
void DzBase::loadSection ( DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID 
) [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework to allow this object to load data for the given section. Derived classes override this method to read section data from the native file format.

Parameters:
file The file to read from
sectionID The section ID of the section to read.

Reimplemented in DzBackdrop, DzBoneBinding, DzBrickParam, DzBulgeBinding, DzSimpleElementData, DzDefaultInParam, DzElement, DzEnumParam, DzERCLink, DzExpressionInput, DzExpression, DzFacetShape, DzFormulaController, DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacyAlternateGeometry, DzLegacyIKChains, DzLegacyIKChain, DzLegacyJoint, DzLegacyJointParam, DzLegacyJointSphere, DzLegacySmoothScale, DzLegacyTwistParam, DzMatrixParam, DzModifier, DzNaturalSpline, DzObject, DzOutParam, DzPropertyGroup, DzPropertyGroupTree, DzPropertyParam, DzScript, DzSelectionMap, DzShape, DzSourceFileData, DzGeomSourceFileData, DzVec3Param, and DzWeld.

void DzBase::makePersistent ( QObject *  obj  )  [static]

Function to provide DAZ Script a way to make objects persistent - i.e. so that QtScript will not delete them when they are no longer referenced by the script. This allows object instances to be created in DAZ Script, then passed into the core and remain after the script has finished execution.

void DzBase::makePersistent (  )  [virtual, slot]

Function to provide DAZ Script a way to make objects persistent - i.e. so that Qt will not delete them when they are no longer referenced by the script. This allows object instances to be created in DAZ Script, then passed into the core and remain after the script has finished execution.

void DzBase::postLoadFile ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Called on objects that were read from file once file reading is complete and all objects from that file have been created.

Parameters:
file The file that this object was read from.

Reimplemented in DzBackdrop, DzBulgeBinding, DzElement, DzERCLink, DzExpressionInput, DzExpression, DzFacetShape, DzFormulaController, DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacyAlternateGeometry, DzLegacyIKChains, DzLegacyIKChain, DzLegacyJoint, DzLegacyJointParam, DzLegacyJointSphere, DzLegacySmoothScale, DzLegacyTwistParam, DzObject, DzPropertyGroupTree, DzShape, and DzSourceFileData.

void DzBase::save ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [virtual]

Virtual funtion that is called to allow this object to save itself to the deprecated .daz file format.

Deprecated:
.daz file format is deprecated, please use df/dsf format for saving. See the projects under the saving folder for examples.
Parameters:
file The file to write the data to.

void DzBase::setPointer ( const DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Derived classes should override this method if they ever write out pointer values to the data file. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:
file The file being loaded
sectionID The ID of the file section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read.
ptr The pointer being read.

Reimplemented in DzBackdrop, DzBoneBinding, DzBrickParam, DzBulgeBinding, DzElement, DzEnumParam, DzERCLink, DzExpressionInput, DzExpression, DzFacetShape, DzFormulaController, DzLegacyBendParam, DzLegacyAlternateGeometry, DzLegacyIKChains, DzLegacyIKChain, DzLegacyJoint, DzLegacyJointParam, DzLegacyJointSphere, DzLegacySmoothScale, DzLegacyTwistParam, DzMatrixParam, DzObject, DzOutParam, DzPropertyGroup, DzPropertyGroupTree, DzPropertyParam, DzSelectionMap, DzShape, DzVec3Param, and DzWeld.

void DzBase::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path).

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented in DzBoneBinding, DzBulgeBinding, DzFacetShape, DzLegacyAlternateGeometry, DzLegacyJoint, DzLegacyJointParam, DzObject, and DzShape.

void DzBase::startLoad ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework just before section loading for this object begins. Derived classes can override this method to perform preparatory operations to reading their file data.

Parameters:
file The file being read.

Reimplemented in DzFacetShape, and DzLegacyJointSphere.
